Accessories.productdescription: The all-new OnePlus Power Bank offers a portable charging solution that's fast, compact, and convenient. The powerful 10,000 mAh high-density Lithium-polymer battery is sufficient to fully charge the OnePlus 8, 8 Pro, 8T and your other favorite OnePlus devices. Even better, the dual USB ports can charge two devices simultaneously*, including phones and tablets. Charging time with OnePlus Power Bank (9V/2A) = 1 hour, 45 minutes. With standard 5W charger: 7.5 hours, With PD/QC 18W charger: 3 hours, 40 minutes
Accessories.productreview1: Oneplus Power bank is not upto the mark for quality as expected from oneplus...Takes almost 5 hours to fully charge the power bank... Also it takes around 1 hour 45 minutes to fully charge the latest oneplus 8 pro without warp charging.....The power bank never shows warp charging on oneplus 8 pro which is the latest device ...whereas the official charger takes only 70 minutes for fully charging the device...Bad quality when other brands are offering warp charge supported power banks for the similar price range... Buyers please don't consider the product for quality purchase...
Accessories.productreview2: Oneplus Power bank is not upto the mark for quality as expected from oneplus...Takes almost 5 hours to fully charge the power bank... Also it takes around 1 hour 45 minutes to fully charge the latest oneplus 8 pro without warp charging.....The power bank never shows warp charging on oneplus 8 pro which is the latest device ...whereas the official charger takes only 70 minutes for fully charging the device...Bad quality when other brands are offering warp charge supported power banks for the similar price range... Buyers please don't consider the product for quality purchase...

Accessories.productdescription: FN7 LG Tonefree comes with UV Nano Technology which kills 99.9% bacteria , Clear and Spatial Sound quality with meridian audio technology and it also offers Specialised Active Noise Cancellation to Reduce Urban Noise along with 21 hrs Battery backup (earbuds + cradle) , it also has Ergonomic Design for Balanced for a Better Fitment and Advanced Call Quality with 3 Mics - the upper microphone detects external noise, the inner microphone cancels out unwanted noise when you turn on the ANC function and the lower microphone picks up and amplifies your vocals even in a crowded space. Earbuds are IPX4-rated, meaning they are resistant to water splashes from any direction, so you can keep listening rain or shine.
Accessories.productreview1: I bought this in sept and I'm NOT SATISFIED with the purchase... Don't get me wrong, the sound quality is amazing for a earphone this cheap, but its flat... The bass kicks in only when there's too much bass in the music, else the sound feels very flat... Also the audio via the microphone is bad, and the mic is located on the split end of the cable, which is very low... At times I've heard people complaining that they cannot hear my voice clearly... Only for those who are struck with the price tag of 300-400rs... In that range its good, but if you can spend a 100rs more, get the basshead 225...
Accessories.productreview2: This is a very great earphone with a good quality sound, but it's not for rough usage! The sound is flat, so less bass in regular condition! But the earphone has got a very good frequency range. So still a deep bass is possible but with an equalizer. You can try my preset. Also remember that the quality of sound also depends on your device's sound card.

Accessories.productname: Amozo Back Cover Case for iPhone 13
Accessories.productdescription: ‎Ultra Hybrid Transparent Case ‎15.2 x 9.3 x 1.04 cm; 40 Grams‎ 6.1 Inches ‎Polycarbonate, Thermoplastic Polyurethane
Accessories.productreview1: Quality and fitting are great. However, a bit hard on the corners so needs some strength to apply it, which sometimes feels like may cause scratches or damage to the device itself. Also, seems to be turning yellow just in one week but that too seems to be a problem with Spigen cases.
Accessories.productreview2: Its been exactly a month since I bought this and it is an average product.It started turning yellow and is definitely not scratch resistant as it claims to be and since a few days the case actually is making sounds while I’m using my phone.

Accessories.productdescription: Experience an easy, reliable connection with this enhanced AmazonBasics micro USB cable. The high-quality cable provides a standard Type A USB connector on one end and a Micro Type B connector on the other. Plug the Type A USB connector into a computer, game console, or AC adapter, for instance, and the Micro Type B connector into a device equipped with a Micro Type B port. Micro Type B ports are often found on devices like mobile phones, smartphones, MP3 players, tablets, digital cameras, and digital camcorders.
Accessories.productreview1: i tested this cabel with volatmeter & they produce same current as oem samsung usb cable.. This is really cooper usb cable This is very difficult when our charging cabel damged & in market all chahines cable not charge phone with full speed because they are not made purely with copper.. This i recommend everyone just blind faith me & after u used u gives me thumbs
Accessories.productreview2: Good quality cables from Amazonbasics. They are shielded and wires are good gauge to ensure that voltage drop is minimum and that results in faster charging of phones.Gold plating is not high micron and so fades away after use in few months although does not impact functioning in any noticeable way.The locking in USB port is good on both sides of the cable.Overall a good buy.

Accessories.productdescription: ‎IPHONE11CAMNEW ‎Bubble Proof, Scratch Resistant  ‎Transparent ‎Screen protector ‎Doubledice ‎21 x 11 x 7 cm; 120 Grams‎ 120 g
Accessories.productreview1: Not at all a good product. The adhesive tape came off while applying it on the lens and now that it is stuck there are many air bubbles inside turning the camera and the area beside it white!
Accessories.productreview2: You wont even notice after it is installed ! and it covers entire camera area ! Must mist must buy product for Iphones

Computer System Accessories.productdescription: ZEB-KM2100 is a modular designed multimedia USB keyboard that comes with dedicated keys for multimedia control. The keyboard comes with 114 keys along with 12 multimedia keys that help in taking control your media. The keyboard comes with UV Coated keys and has a dedicated rupee key too
Computer System Accessories.productreview1: It's very light weight keyboard and not for professional.The beginner can use this for their small work. The keys are not smooth. Wire length is sufficient for use. The seller send it with no packaging, it delivered with its original box. I get this ₹315.
Computer System Accessories.productreview2: The keys stop working and don't respond for few minutes. For 5-6 days the keyboard worked very well... But now i m facing such problems. Unsatisfied with this product

Computer System Accessories.productname: TP-Link Archer C20 AC WiFi 750 MBPS Wireless Router
Computer System Accessories.productdescription: The Archer A6 creates a reliable and blazing-fast network powered by 802.11ac Wi-Fi technology. The 5GHz band delivers speeds up to 867Mbps, ideal for HD video streaming and lag-free online gaming.
Computer System Accessories.productreview1: I am writing this review on the item that I already got replaced thinking the previous one was faulty. Today when I received the replaced one I understand that the earlier product was not faulty rather the product line itself is poor.
Computer System Accessories.productreview2: The thing died on me within a month of use - only the power light turns on, no wifi or network lights. Tried the wifi button as well as the reset hole with no response. Tried turning it off and unplugged for a whole day and still nothing.

Computer System Accessories.productdescription: The Dell Optical Mouse – MS116 features optical LED tracking and wired connectivity, providing a stellar performance day after day. Improve your productivity at the office or at home – the Dell Optical Mouse will help to keep you on task with accurate 1,000 DPI optical tracking.
Computer System Accessories.productreview1: Bought this mouse after a long research so writing here my review after 2 years of usage. For those complaining aboit long keys and uncomfortable usage, let me tell you this is complete mouse and not mice so you need to understand difference. This is much more comfortable than mice if you work for long hours.
Computer System Accessories.productreview2: I specifically ordered this item because it said country of origin is India. When I open the box it said maid in China. Why are you misleading the people by false advertising?

Computer System Accessories.productname: WD 1.5 TB Wired External Hard Disk Drive
Computer System Accessories.productdescription: USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 compatibility. Formatted NTFS for Windows10, Windows 8.1. Reformatting may be required for other operating systems. Compatibility may vary depending on user’s hardware configuration and operating system.
Computer System Accessories.productreview1: very poor product... hard drive did not even detected in my PC. I tried in o4 other PCs also... but same result...I m very much disappointed with Amazon as I have gifted this hard disk to my sister on occasion of Rakhi . I will suggest not to buy this from amazon.
Computer System Accessories.productreview2: Ordered this on freedom sale and got this for only 3600. I was deciding between WD or Seagate but ended up on this as WD is somewhat more reputable than the latter.

Desktop Computers.productreview1: This is the worst product which anybody can think of. The system came to me without Windows and MS Office. After multiple calls and complaints also, there is no reply or revert from anyone.
Desktop Computers.productreview2: The actual product picture displayed is different from actual. DvD writer and memory card slot is there in product picture displayed and not there in actual model number mentioned.

Desktop Computers.productdescription: Be ready to out-do every task with the power of Ryzen 5000 series processors with 8GB RAM and 512GB SSD. Let your productivity reach new heights with sufficient space along with quick boot and load time and data transfers

Desktop Computers.productdescription: Apple-designed M1 chip for a giant leap in CPU, GPU, and machine learning performance  8-core CPU packs up to 3x faster performance to fly through workflows quicker than ever 16-core Neural Engine for advanced machine learning
Desktop Computers.productreview1: It's a pretty good product for the price that I got it for. I got a very sweet deal because of the preorder, and I'm very happy with the price as well as performance. Pretty snappy and fast.
Desktop Computers.productreview2: I am already using a Macbook Air M1 for sometime now. I needed a compact (and clean) setup for my desktop (home office) setup. I got this for 60k and its the cheapest mac you can get with an M1 chip. 8GB / 256GB is more than sufficient for my computing needs.

Desktop Computers.productdescription: Everyday computing just got easier with the Dell Optiplex 3020 Desktop PC. Enjoy true reliability at home with a simple, yet powerful value-packed desktop that gets the job done. With a robust metal chassis that has undergone intense Highly Accelerated Life Testing, the OptiPlex 3020 is designed for ultimate durability and reliability Fully loaded with an Intel Core i3-4150T 3GHz Processor and 8GB Memory, the Optiplex 3020 makes for a speedy and efficient PC. The 256 GB Solid State Drive(SSD) provides ample space to store all crucial data safely and improves the overall performance and speed of operations. The Optiplex 3020 is also pre-loaded with Windows 10 Professional (64-Bit) that offers a user-friendly interface. it comes along with a 6 months seller warranty applicable PAN India, extendable upto 2 additional years.

Flat Screen TVs.productname: LG 139.7 cm (55 inches) 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV
Flat Screen TVs.productdescription: Crystal 4K Display with a billion true colors ensures optimized colour expression so you can see every detail,4K UHD TV goes beyond regular FHD with 4x more pixels
Flat Screen TVs.productreview1: My brand new tv switch offs abruptly within 1 min from switching on., unable to raise replacement query due to poor back end support
Flat Screen TVs.productreview2: Not worth 49k. Having 50inch crystle 4k. Many features are disabled as default. Picture quality is good but you can get the same quality in much less priced tv.

Flat Screen TVs.productname: Samsung 138 cm (55 inches) Crystal 4K Series Ultra HD Smart LED TV
Flat Screen TVs.productdescription: Powerful 4K upscaling ensures you get up to 4K resolution for the content you love. You'll also experience more lifelike color expressions due to its sophisticated color mapping technology.
Flat Screen TVs.productreview1: I purchased a new tv 11th May but I got open box product. Cloudtail please this time send original company packaging product. Please don't send any replace item.
Flat Screen TVs.productreview2: In just 20 days the TV screen display has become defective. No display, screen is black. Only sound coming. Sound level is also very low compared to size of TV.

Flat Screen TVs.productname: Inspired LED Normal Bright, Backlight Mini Kit for TV
Flat Screen TVs.productdescription: How Backlighting works The frequent and sometimes dramatic variation in picture brightness from your television screen can cause visual fatigue in an otherwise dark room. Featuring energy-efficient, modular design, the Home Theater TV Backlight Kit from Inspired LED provides adequate bias light to reduce eyestrain, making your television display seem crisper and the colors appear more vivid. Product Placement Frequently used product placement behind flat screen TVs. This is a straight strip behind the TV along the back of the TV screen.
Flat Screen TVs.productreview1: This LED backlight strip is awesome. We have a 54 Panasonic Plasma and the strip fits perfectly. Our TV is on a stand sitting on a console (not wall mounted). I read this elsewhere, so I'll repeat it here: Get yourself some blue painters tape to temporarily mount the light strip to make sure it's in the right spot. About 8 thin pieces hold it up nicely (don't cover the LEDs!) so it can easily be moved again and again. Once you have it in the right place, just use the included sticky stuff.
Flat Screen TVs.productreview2: This light kit installed easily and quickly. I put them on the back of my Samsung 50 LED which is sitting about 15 away from the wall. I continue to be amazed at how much of an improvement this kit has made to my TV viewing.

Flat Screen TVs.productname: iFFALCON 139 cm (55 inches) 4K Ultra HD Certified Android Smart LED TV
Flat Screen TVs.productdescription: iFFALCON 4K HDR TV reproduce in stunning details all shades of light, natural colors for a truly immersive viewing experience via 3,840 x 2,160 pixels (4 x the number of pixels on Full HD TVs). Also HDR 10 adjusts the content in dynamic scene-by- scene way for the optimum representation of contrast with wider color gamut. The TV will present you a perfect picture quality in every scene.
Flat Screen TVs.productreview1: I have got installed 43  TV on oct19/2021. Yes, wall mount is not in box and I paid Rs.399/-. Most of the brands are giving but still there are many well known brands are not and is wall mount is chargeable. Display quality is good and sound quality is best. 24 watt speakers are very good. We don't get this much sound in other brands.
Flat Screen TVs.productreview2: It's definitely not ultra HD or 4K TV. Picture quality on  is poor but on YouTube it's too bad. Feels like FHD while playing on 2k resulation. I have used MI 5X 43inch 4K which is used to produce fabulous picture at 360p like FHD.

Flat Screens.productname: Rife Mobile TV Stand for Flat Screen Televisions
Flat Screens.productdescription: Universal TV pedestal is the ideal stand for your flat panel TV. It easily connects to the bolt holes behind your TV for a durable and sleek table top installation. With height adjustability and durable sleek design, it is an ideal TV stand solution for your flat panel TV. Heavy-duty steel can carry up to 110 lbs of load, perfect for even the largest plasma televisions. The extended base ensures high level of stability. Multiple installation holes and two levels of base height adjustment allows you to achieve the perfect TV height.
Flat Screens.productreview1: It’s a very good stand, we assembled it on our 50 inch LG tv and it fits very well. The only drawback is that the stand can fall with a slight push because of the wait of the tv leaning in the front a little bit. Had to tie it down to the tv cabinet for avoiding a mishap
Flat Screens.productreview2: It is definitely world class and I would be very surprised if it was made in India. It is great. Need a bit of experience in mechanics to put it together though.

Flat Screens.productname: Rife Adjustable Tilt Swivel Full Motion
Flat Screens.productdescription: Fits most 32-72 inch TV with mounting hole patterns 200x100 to 600 x 400mm. The wall mount has heavy steel construction, maximum loading capacity to 60 kg. Front and back telescoping distance (TV to wall distance) is 62.5 cm -46.5 cm.
Flat Screens.productreview1: I was looking for months for a perfect 100x100 vesa plate slot , i have a 34 inch ultrawide lg curved monitor and was trying for long time to get wall mount which can fit it the back of the monitor slot, this wallmount perfectly fits in and is sturdy enough to hold the monitor.
Flat Screens.productreview2: The mount is sturdy to say the least. It includes almost everything you will need to mount it. It comes with spacers which were a life saver because my monitor had a weird mounting dent in it, which is why other mounts couldn't fit.

Flat Screens.productname: Screen Protector Guard for Apple iPhone 11
Flat Screens.productdescription: Compatible Device: Designed specifically for the iPhone 11 and iPhone XR 6.1”. Not compatible with any other models.Easy Self Installation kit: Cleaning kit & installation frame make putting it on your iPhone 11 and iPhone XR very easy.
Flat Screens.productreview1: Had to buy this today with same day delivery benefit (compelled due to similar ratings but tad cheaper than similar description screen Guard.) I had dropped my phone due to imbalance and the screen guard got chipped and cracked.
Flat Screens.productreview2: First off, the installation was pretty easy. The dry wipe wasn't very good and caused more dust but the alcohol wipe worked well. Using the guard, installation was pretty easy. It seems a tad finicky at first but does the job.

Graphics Card.productreview1: The graphics card is so much better than the noisy Radeon HD 7850 I upgraded from. I'm now about to play recent games and have even attempted crypto mining.
Graphics Card.productreview2: 60-75 fps at 1080p ultra settings every game, even cod vanguard. warzone 90 fps, apex legends 130.

Graphics Card.productname: Colorful GeForce GT 1030 4GB DDR4 RAM Graphics Card
Graphics Card.productdescription: The Colorful GeForce GT1030 V4-V 2GB Graphics Card is based on the recently announced GeForce GT 1030, which has 384 CUDA cores, a 64-bit memory bus, and a 30W power draw that requires no external power connectors. Colorful set the core clock of its GT 1030 at 1,277MHz and the boost clock at 1,468MHz. The card is equipped with 4GB of DDR4 memory clocked at 6,008MHz.The company boasts an all-solid-state capacitor power delivery design that Colorful stated delivers higher stability and reliability. The custom cooling solution features a black and red plastic shroud mated to an aluminum heatsink and a 90mm cooling fan. The additional cooling enables higher boost clock speeds and overclocking headroom. All the AAA Gaming Titles such as GTA V are very much playable with this little baby. It is the best budget gaming Graphic card in the 4GB RAM category
Graphics Card.productreview1: 2 Day Review: The card is just fine i guss for beginners as it does the job.. System Configuration in photo...
Graphics Card.productreview2: But this one does not support NVENC hardware encoder because of which i am unable to record gameplays smoothly. So one star less for that.

Graphics Card.productname: ASUS GeForce GT 730 2GB GDDR5 Low Profile Graphics Card
Graphics Card.productdescription: The ASUS GeForce GT 730 2GB GDDR5 Graphics Card comes with 384 CUDA cores, a Base clock speed of 902 MHz and operates across a 64-bit wide bus interface. Based on NVIDIA Kepler architecture, the ASUS GeForce GT 730 comes in half height half length form factor, enabling a perfect fit for those systems with space constraint. Unique fan design dissipates heat efficiently while extending a graphic card’s lifespan by 25% through increased dust and particle resistance.
Graphics Card.productreview1: It is good card for this price. You can play all old pc games with this. It is 40% better than gt 710 ddr5. Games I have tested and all above 40-45fps at 800p resolution at high graphics are...
Graphics Card.productreview2: I'm in love with this graphics card. I can even play Batman : Arkham Knight, Just Cause 4, NFS Rival and many many more games with it. And I think Assassins Creed Unity, AC Synidicate, Witcher 3 : Wild Hunt, Ghost Recon Wildlands will also run on it.

Keyboards.productdescription: Reliable Plug and Play: The USB receiver provides a reliable wireless connection up to 33 ft (1), so you can forget about drop-outs and delays and you can take it wherever you use your computer.Type in Comfort: The design of this keyboard creates a comfortable typing experience thanks to the low-profile, quiet keys and standard layout with full-size F-keys, number pad, and arrow keys.
Keyboards.productreview1: A month after receiving the wireless keyboard, the switch on the keyboard has started malfunctioning. The keyboard now works very erratically.
Keyboards.productreview2: I am unable to carry it the very long distance to the Logitech service centre in Andheri-East as I have a spinal fracture. So, to me this product has been a write off of the money spent. Logitech should not incorporate the switch on the keyboard. It is a component that is most likely to malfunction on switching it on and off every day. Can Amazon help me with a replacement?

Keyboards.productdescription: Reliable Plug and Play: The USB receiver provides a reliable wireless connection up to 33 ft (1), so you can forget about drop-outs and delays and you can take it wherever you use your computer.Type in Comfort: The design of this keyboard creates a comfortable typing experience thanks to the low-profile, quiet keys and standard layout with full-size F-keys, number pad, and arrow keys.
Keyboards.productreview1: This is actually a keyboard which one longs for. Smooth and silent typing, perfect in size. Spill proof feature and the extra key rows on top are the best part of it. The keays are placed in a flat tray which has few small wholes under it to drain out the liquid, if accidentally some falls on the keyboard. Top key rows idea includes some dedicated keys for shut down, calculator, media keys etc.
Keyboards.productreview2: The mouse clicks are also very smooth and silent with an on/off button just like the keyboard, though its a bit small in size as compared to other normal sized mice. But, I think, its not a big issue, as you will get accustomed to it in a day or two.

Keyboards.productdescription: Reliable Plug and Play: The USB receiver provides a reliable wireless connection up to 33 ft (1), so you can forget about drop-outs and delays and you can take it wherever you use your computer.Type in Comfort: The design of this keyboard creates a comfortable typing experience thanks to the low-profile, quiet keys and standard layout with full-size F-keys, number pad, and arrow keys.
Keyboards.productreview1: And the amazon standard packaging is aslo not there. We received simply the logitech cartoon normal taped on the both the ends, resulted broken keys in this wrong product. suggestion to the seller and the amazon, Please try to improve these. I have returned to replace the same ordereded product. let me see what they are going to send.
Keyboards.productreview2: Clearly, there was a clarification that this is a Logitech UNIFYING technology. The reality was that it was not. The biggest problem is that it does not allow me to return the product. Only an exchange. I do not want this product since it does not have the Unifying feature.

Keyboards.productname: Dell KB216 Wired Multimedia USB Keyboard
Keyboards.productdescription: Reliable Plug and Play: The USB receiver provides a reliable wireless connection up to 33 ft (1), so you can forget about drop-outs and delays and you can take it wherever you use your computer.Type in Comfort: The design of this keyboard creates a comfortable typing experience thanks to the low-profile, quiet keys and standard layout with full-size F-keys, number pad, and arrow keys.
Keyboards.productreview1: I wanted a full size keyboard to carry in my laptop bag. Most compact keyboards have the layout like laptops i.e. mini arrow keys and cornered page up/down keys, which is illogical because who would buy a separate keyboard which is EXACTLY the same as the laptop's keyboard?
Keyboards.productreview2: Both the mouse and keyboard use a common nano receiver, earlier I had a wireless Dell mouse and I didn't want to insert two separate usb receivers for both keyboard and mouse, this logitech combo serves that purpose perfectly.

Keyboards.productname: HP K500F Backlit Membrane Wired Gaming Keyboard
Redgear Blaze Semi-Mechanical wired Gaming keyboard

Mice.productname: AmazonBasics Wireless Mouse with Nano Receiver
Mice.productdescription: Experience cord-free convenience and a reliable connection with the AmazonBasics Wireless Mouse. The optical three-button mouse with nano receiver works with laptops, desktops, and netbook PCs. It makes a great choice for home, office, or travel, providing a fast, responsive connection-all at an affordable price.
Mice.productreview1: I suspect if the Mouse falls the Switch may break with pressure.The design of the Switch is not right. It is vertical.It should be horizontal making it easier to switch On/OFF.
Mice.productreview2: Worst mouse in terms of performance, eats a lot of battery. I have replaced batteries at least 3 times in 2 months. My earlier logitech mouse was way better and I used to change battery only once in 5-6 months. Don't buy this, go for Logitech only as they make much better product. I thought to use Amazon this time but I regret now.

Mice.productdescription: The AmazonBasics Wireless Mouse sets up in seconds. After removing the nano receiver from the battery compartment* and replacing the back cover, simply insert the receiver into the USB port of a compatible computer, flip the mouse’s power switch to “on” (located at the bottom), and it’s good to go.
Mice.productreview1: Average mouse, but expensive. Power switch is so small, you may need to use a microscope. Battery chamber is so weird that you can tell it's a bug converted into a feature. Manoeuvrability and size is decent. But it's heavy.
Mice.productreview2: the battery connection keeps on getting dislodged now and then and thus stpops working.have to open the battery compartment and reshuffle batteries to fit them in again to get going.

Mice.productname: Dell MS116 1000DPI USB Wired Optical Mouse
Mice.productdescription: The optical three-button mouse features a 2.4 GHz wireless connection to the nano receiver, which means easy scrolling, fast clicking, and smooth, responsive tracking when highlighting text.
Mice.productreview1: I would suggest spend a little more and buy Dell or HP or Lenovo. The pointer orientation sucks and there is nothing which you do. i actually ordered this product, but not replacement.
Mice.productreview2: But it consumes a lot of energy. Nomal AAA Batteries hardly survive for 10days and Duracell for 30-45 days.

Mice.productreview1: An excellent product. I have been using this wireless mouse for last 2 years vigorously. It is rendering flawless service throughout. Best value for money. I recommend everybody to use this item. Battery consumption is also low and one will find economy. Thanks Amazonbasics.
Mice.productreview2: amazing product delivered within a day... i was told i will get within 2 days but as soon as told amazon cutomer service that i need on urgent basis they made sure that i got my product within a day.
